title: 90/111/EEC: Commission Decision of 19 February 1990 amending Decision 84/248/EEC authorizing the Federal Republic of Germany to adopt, when introducing into its territory plants or plant products, special plant health provisions for home-grown production of certain fruit plants intended for planting (Only the German text is authentic)
header:
COMMISSION  DECISION
of 19 February 1990
amending Decision 84/248/EEC authorizing the Federal Republic of Germany to adopt, when introducing into its territory plants or plant products, special plant health provisions for home-grown production of certain fruit plants intended for planting
(Only the German text is authentic)
(90/111/EEC)
THE COMMISSION OF THE EUROPEAN COMMUNITIES
main_body:
Decision 84/248/EEC is hereby amended as follows:
1. In Article 2, '31 December 1989' is replaced by '31 December 1990'.
2. The Annex is replaced by the Annex hereto.
This Decision is addressed to the Federal Republic of Germany.
attachments:
Done at Brussels, 19 February 1990.
For the Commission
Ray MAC SHARRY
Member of the Commission
(1) OJ No L 26, 31. 1. 1977, p. 20.
(2) OJ No L 212, 22. 7. 1989, p. 106.
(3) Bundesgesetzblatt, Part I, p. 1120.
(4) Bundesgesetzblatt, Part I, p. 2105.
(5) OJ No L 130, 16. 5. 1984, p. 27.
(6) OJ No L 150, 2. 6. 1989, p. 26.
ANNEX
'ANNEX
The measures referred to in Article 1 apply to fruiting plants mentioned in column 1 in respect of harmful organisms mentioned in column 2 against them, with effect from the dates mentioned in column 3.
